title: The meditat[i]ons of saint Bernard
author: Bernard, of Clairvaux, Saint, 1090 or 91-1153.
publicationDate: the ix. daye of Marche. the yere of our lorde M.LLLL.lxxxxvi 1496, i.e. 1499]
notes: An English translation, by "a deuoute student of the Vnyuersyte of Cambrydge", of: Bernard of Clairvaux.  Tractatus de interiori domo.
GW attributes this work to Pseudo-Bernard.
Imprint from colophon; actual date of publication suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
